name: FileMaker Pro Label File
summary: Learn about .FLB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The FileMaker installation includes several standard label layouts, such as Avery and DYMO layouts. The files are located in the /​Extensions/​Labels/​ directory of the FileMaker installation.

description: File used by FileMaker Pro, a desktop database application; stored using XML formatting and includes label layout dimensions; often used for printing mailing address stickers; can be populated with FileMaker database records.
